list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: on, toward, or relating to the side of a human body or of a thing that is to the west when the person or thing is facing north.
relating to a person or group favoring liberal, socialist, or radical views.
on or to the left side.
the left-hand part, side, or direction.
a group or party favoring liberal, socialist, or radical views.
